name: inker
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an artist who adds solid lines and extra details to the first pencil drawings for a comic, graphic novel, or animation (= a book or film whose story is told in pictures): His first animation work was on Popeye, as an inker. Inkers ink over the pencilled lines, providing definition and shadows. Compare
colourist (ARTIST)
letterer
penciller
More examplesFewer examplesHis pencilling was obscured by an inker and a colourist.For a time he worked as an inker on the Richie Rich comic.He spent the next 16 years as an inker and by the 1955 classic "Lady and the Tramp" had become the lead ink artist.
